title: ‘Golden’ From ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Becomes First K-Pop Grammy Winner Ever
summary: “It’s our moment” for Huntr/x and Netflix’s mega-hit “KPop Demon Hunters.” EJAE, Audrey Nuna and Rei Ami, the singers from “KPop Demon Hunters,” can add Grammy winners to their list of accolades. Their song “Golden” won best song written for visual media, presented in the pre-telecast ceremony Sund…

title: "الفتى الذهبي".. الأهلي يودع حمزة الكريم بعد انتقاله إلى برشلونة
summary: حرص النادي الأهلي على توجيه رسالة وداعية إلى النجم الشاب عبد الكريم حمزة، بعد إتمام انتقاله الرسمي إلى صفوف فريق برشلونة الإسباني.

title: Weekly poll: how important is magnetic wireless charging to you?
summary: Apple introduced MagSafe wireless charging in 2020 with the iPhone 12 series. In contrast to regular wireless charging, it uses magnets rather than relying on manual alignment between the charging coils or on gravity to keep the phone and charger together. It is a simple, cheap and effective soluti…
